import { ChangeEvent, useState } from 'react' const App = (): JSX.Element => { const [term, setTerm] = useState('') const onInputChange = (e: ChangeEvent) => { setTerm(e.target.value) fetch( `http:// api.openweathermap.org/geo/1.0/direct?q=${term}&limit=5&appid=${process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY}` ) } return (

Weather Forecast

Enter below a place you want to know the weather of and select an option from dropdown

) } export default App
